name: Procedurally Generate Cities! Construct 3 Tutorial
description:
Tutorial on how to create large top down GTA 2 style cities in Construct 3.

Probable Train's city-generator (link below) is used to create large organic looking cities and the resulting svg and png files used to drive the creation of water, roads, parks, and 3D Shape plugin buildings. 

Probably Train's city generator: https://probabletrain.itch.io/city-generator

---

GAME CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to drive around the demo.

---

I have included the project file to follow along  and review how the event sheet / javascript work together.  Feel free to use however, no credit needed, cc0 etc. 

Check it out on YouTube and let me know what you think!  Subscribe if you enjoyed, would make my day :)
